events.message: We have received the job application for the software engineer position from the candidate earlier today.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on the candidate's background.
A recruiter has been assigned to coordinate further steps in the hiring process for this software engineering candidate.
The initial screening call with the candidate was completed successfully with positive engagement regarding their engineering skills.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward in the software engineering process.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their developer and coding skills in a live environment.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong software development and problem-solving abilities.
Following the technical round, the HR interview was scheduled to discuss organizational fit and employment terms.
The HR interview went smoothly, with the candidate showing alignment with company culture and values.
An offer for the software engineer position has been proposed to the candidate, including competitive compensation and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and committed to joining as a software engineer on the agreed-upon start date.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including setup of development environment and team introduction.
The hiring process was successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team as a new developer.
